Scavenger beasts are monsters found in the Chambers of Xeric. They are found in ruins and drop various items needed for puzzles and materials for skilling. They closely resemble Skavids found in the Feldip Hills region of Kandarin, as they appeared prior to their graphical update on 5 December 2006. They may be a subspecies of Skavid native to Mount Quidamortem.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
    • 1.2 Tools
    • 1.3 Materials
  • 2 Trivia
  • 3 References

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 432,911 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

Scavenger beasts drop three items at a time.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • These beasts ended up replacing the original Scavenger runt.
